frontmatter.title: Helix
frontmatter.description: Helix allows you to write Ruby classes in Rust without having to write the glue code yourself.

frontmatter.title: inline-python
frontmatter.description: Inline Python code directly in your Rust code.

frontmatter.title: jlrs
frontmatter.description: The main goal behind jlrs is to provide a simple and safe interface to the Julia C API.

frontmatter.title: PyO3
frontmatter.description: Rust bindings for Python. This includes running and interacting with Python code from a Rust binary, as well as writing native Python modules.

frontmatter.description: Rust bindings for Python. This includes running and interacting with Python code from a Rust binary, as well as writing native Python modules.

frontmatter.title: rlua
frontmatter.description: This library is a high level interface between Rust and Lua. Its goal is to be an easy to use, practical, flexible, and safe API between Rust and Lua.

frontmatter.title: rust-cpp
frontmatter.description: rust-cpp is a build tool & macro which enables you to write C++ code inline in your rust code.

frontmatter.title: Rustler
frontmatter.description: Rustler is a library for writing Erlang NIFs in safe Rust code. The library provides functionality for both Erlang and Elixir.
